channel.title: Log-in issue
channel.description:
Hello moparians.
Recently on project rainbow, a weird log-in bug popped up. Sadly enough we got very limited information, on what is actually causing this. This is what i got told, about the cause of the problem. The error is because PIDs get fudgeed up when the VNC gets full.
When you try to log-in it says: 'Could not complete log-in, try using a different world'. The owner has been looking into player files, and sometimes they where completely blank.
It'd be really appreciated if anyone knows what the problem causer can be. Thanks for reading, hopefully you can provide us help.

item.title: Log-in issue
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Let the servers owner post for help, what you have supplied isn’t good enough.

Read full topic

item.title: Log-in issue
item.dc:creator: @wimstr wimstr
item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

Hello moparians.

Recently on project rainbow, a weird log-in bug popped up.
Sadly enough we got very limited information, on what is actually causing this.
This is what i got told, about the cause of the problem.
The error is because PIDs get fudgeed up when the VNC gets full.

When you try to log-in it says: ‘Could not complete log-in, try using a different world’.
The owner has been looking into player files, and sometimes they where completely blank.

It’d be really appreciated if anyone knows what the problem causer can be.
Thanks for reading, hopefully you can provide us help.
